about_the_game:
In 1999, 18-year-old high school student Lu Yu suddenly begins to dream of a strange ancient castle, which leads him to uncover a long-buried secret. Along the way, he encounters people belonging to different factions, a body he cannot control at midnight, hidden identities of his family, and friends who are scheming something in secret. Caught inexplicably in a struggle among multiple parties, will he be able to remain safe in the end?

Attention!!!

This game currently offers multiple translation versions, which can be adjusted in the settings.

There are some scenes with highlights or loud volumes in the game, so please check your settings before starting to avoid being startled; aside from that, there are no horror elements.

The storyline is completely fictional, but to enhance immersion, some real-world names are involved in the script, so please be cautious in distinguishing them.

The game content is about 60000 words (sixty thousand for Chinese), and considering the conventional reading speed and elements such as standing scenes, the overall gameplay time should be at least 4 hours, for reference only.

The game currently does not support cloud saving. If you need to transfer the save, please backup it through the framework or manually.

The path is: [Game installation path]/game/saves

In conclusion

this work can be regarded as a fantasy or science fiction visual novel created independently by the author.

The game itself is produced in Simplified Chinese, while the other translation versions utilize machine translation and AI checks. The author can only perform a certain level of manual verification for the English version, while the support for other versions is not ideal. If you are not familiar with Simplified Chinese or English, you may wait for better translation support. The translation work will be placed in a public area, leveraging everyone's assistance to complete this task and updating the game's support status in real-time.

This is my first game, and it is also my first visual novel, so I lack experience in many areas. I hope everyone can provide feedback to help me know how to improve, If you think it's good, you can recommend it to your friends around you, which is very important to me..

The "SecretPact" is a very long script that I wrote, and it's quite rich, and as the first installment of the series, there are many buried clues and stories yet to be told. I hope for your support in helping me tell and complete this story well. Thank you.
